description:
Hello everyone

host-evacuate/evacuate functions can migrate a downtime in all instances to another compute node.
example:
nova host-evacuate --target_host compute1 compute2

whether the virtual machine scheduler all reasonable dispatch to more servers?
title: evacuate scheduler can support it?

comments.content:
Hello everyone

host-evacuate/evacuate functions can migrate a downtime in all instances to another compute node.
example:
nova host-evacuate --target_host compute1 compute2

whether the virtual machine scheduler all reasonable dispatch to more servers?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~troy-chen

comments.content:
Troy,

Please post your question to the mailing list (<email address hidden>), as opposed to an actual bug.  This is a question and not a bug.

Regards,
Thang
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~thang-pham
